name: The Last Seed
description:
A small casual survival gamejam game about keeping the last known tree in the world alive. In order to survive and maintain life, you must keep up your water levels and sun until your tree matures. Once your tree can produce offspring you have won!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OqwZ-P6KQF4

Controls:

Mouse button click on sun and water to restock.

M to mute game.
